items.summary:
Amazon is getting folks prepped for their spring lawn rejuvenation by offering the Worx 12A 14-inch Corded Lawn Dethatcher at $101.83 shipped. While it carries a $170 MSRP, it’s coming down from its more recent $142 rate that it’s been holding to in the new year, beating out all the prior discounts we’ve seen since July 2025. Considering that the Greenworks dethatcher/scarifier is only available in a $150 used condition, while Sun Joe’s model has been keeping to its full $160 price since mid-December, this is certainly the most affordable option for brand-new equipment that gives you budget-friendly functionality. All-in-all, you’re looking at a $40 markdown off the recent going rate (and $68 off the MSRP) for the best price we have tracked over the last six months and the third-best price overall.

While it goes for $2,098 at full price directly from the Anker website, we’ve been seeing this bundle keep down between $1,249 and $1,199 recently, with it having gone as low as $1,049 before. If you missed out on that low price during Christmas/New Year sales, you’re getting it at the next-best rate here, as $151 is cut from the recent going rate (and $950 off the MSRP). You can also pick up Anker’s SOLIX C2000 Gen 2 power station by itself at $799 shipped (and matching at Amazon) if you don’t want the charge-as-you-drive functionality of the bundle, which we also recently went hands-on with in our latest review.
